'''Mrs. K.''' was [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]]'s nanny when she was little. She also taught Rachel Spanish, and considered [[Sandra Greene|Rachel's mom]] crazy.

She was only mentioned in "[[The One With The Baby Shower]]".

In the uncut version of the episode, Rachel and Sandra mention that they don't know her actual name.
